info.name: Random Curiosity - Black ( randomc )
info.description:
Nice dark theme makes it easier on the eyes.  Links are blue everywhere except the right panel (hovering over a link will still be the lighter blue).  If you have ads on the site, install Adblock Plus and add a filter subscription.

Full-size "After" image:
http://sadpanda.us/images/204383-G8ZWVLJ.png
info.additionalInfo:
2013 Sep 24: Fixed comment text backgrounds.  Alternating Purple/Blue for regular comments, Highly Rated is Green, Poorly Rated is Dark Brown, Hotly Rated is Grey, Author of post is Red, other author is a darker Red.
2013 Sep 23: Updated colors for Fall 2013 schedule to correspond with the writer covering the show.  Minor edit to top rotating banner.
2011 Sep 29: Divine changed the color scheme to green, which looks odd against black.  Changed it back to the light blue colors.  Also fixed the top navigation again.  (Looks like the green colors are now gone.)
2011 Sep 28: Edited/Added author colors for the season schedules.  
2010 Oct 27: Fixed filmstrip colors.  (Oops, messed some other things up.  Should be good now.)
2010 Sep 30: Fixed season schedule colors.
2010 Sep 25: Fixed poll colors, in both post and sidebar.
2010 Sep 17: Fixed comment colors.
2010 Sep 05: Flash player in the right panel hidden.  Fixed some images & comment colors.  Top navigation now semi-transparent.
